mapper.select:
SELECT A.ID, A.NAME, A.SEX, A.BIRTH, A.IDNUM, A.PHONE, A.MAIL, A.QQ, A.ADDRESS, A.HOMEADDRESS, A.HOMETOWN, A.ACCOUNTPROP, A.PLOITICAL, A.MARITAL, A.NATIONALITY, A.HEIGHT, A.WEIGHT, A.BLOODTYPE, A.EDUCATION, A.SCHOOL, A.GRADUATION, A.PROFESSION, A.ATSCHOOL, A.WORKCOMPANY, A.WORKEXP, A.CERTIFICATE, A.CHANNEL, A.POSITION, A.DEPARTMENT, A.WAGES, A.INTERVIEWER, A.INVITATIONDATE, A.RECRUITDATE, A.SCORE, A.ISQUALIFIED, A.ISPAY, A.REMARK, A.ISDELETE, A.UPDATEDATE, A.UPDATEACCOUNT, B.NAME AS DEPARTMENTNAME, C.POSITION_NAME AS POSITIONNAME, D.RECRUITCHANNEL_NAME AS CHANNELNAME, ( CASE A.ISENTRY WHEN 0 THEN '未入职' WHEN 1 THEN '在职' WHEN 2 THEN '离职' END ) ISENTRY FROM ZP_RECRUITDATA AS A LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT AS B ON A.DEPARTMENT = B.ID LEFT JOIN POSITION_DATA AS C ON A.POSITION = C.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN ZP_RECRUITCHANNEL AS D ON A.CHANNEL = D.RECRUITCHANNEL_ID
AND A.ISDELETE = 0
AND A.DEPARTMENT = #{department}
AND A.POSITION = #{position}
AND A.CHANNEL = #{channel}
AND A.ISQUALIFIED = '否'
AND A.ISQUALIFIED = '是'
AND A.ISQUALIFIED = '待定'
AND A.INVITATIONDATE >= #{begDate} AND A.INVITATIONDATE < #{endDate}
AND A.RECRUITDATE >= #{begDate} AND A.RECRUITDATE < #{endDate}
AND A.ISENTRY = 0
AND A.ISENTRY = 1
AND A.ISENTRY = 2
AND A.NAME LIKE '%' + #{name} + '%'
AND (A.PHONE LIKE '%' + #{phone} + '%' OR A.MAIL LIKE '%' + #{phone} + '%' OR A.QQ LIKE '%' + #{phone} + '%')
AND A.SEX = '男'
AND A.SEX = '女'
AND A.ISPAY = #{isPay}
AND A.EDUCATION = '未知'
AND A.EDUCATION = '博士'
AND A.EDUCATION = '硕士研究生'
AND A.EDUCATION = '本科'
AND A.EDUCATION = '专科'
AND A.EDUCATION = '高中/中专'
AND A.EDUCATION = '初中及以下'
AND A.PROFESSION LIKE '%' + #{profession} + '%'
AND A.ATSCHOOL = #{atSchool}
